H0.text: What name is given to belief in more than one god. Polytheology

H1.text: What name is given to belief in more than one god. Multitheism

H2.text: What name is given to belief in more than one god. Deismultiplex

H3.text: What name is given to belief in more than one god. Politeism

A4.text: Polytheism is the belief in or worship of more than one god.

A5.text: The term polytheism was first revived in French by Jean Bodin in 1580, followed by Samuel Purchas's usage in English in 1614.
